## Changes in v1.4.5

- Release for signed DMG and in-app updates.

---

Note: This DMG is signed for smooth installation. Users on earlier versions will receive an automatic update prompt.

**If in-app update gets stuck at "Installing...":** Quit Jarvis, then download the **Jarvis-6.0-1.4.5-SIGNED.dmg** from the Assets below and open it to install. Your settings and data are preserved.
